text: Poul Hansen (1913–1966) was a Danish Minister of Defence and Minister of Finance. Poul Hansen may also refer to: * Poul Hansen (football manager) (born 1953), Danish top-flight football (soccer) manager * Poul L. Hansen (1916–2002), Danish international football (soccer) player * Poul Hansen (sport wrestler) (1891–1948), Danish Olympic silver medalist sport wrestler * Poul Hansen Egede (1708–1789), Danish-Norwegian missionary to Greenland * Poul Hansen (mayor) (1922–2017), Danish mayor == See also == * Paul Hanson (disambiguation)
title: Poul Hansen (disambiguation)
